Translations.Text: The knowledge of the hour is referred to Him. And no fruit come out of its coverings, and no female gets pregnant and gives birth without His knowledge. And on a day that He calls them (saying): where are My associates? They say: we notified You that there is no witness among us
And what they used to call on in the past abandoned them, and they realize that there is no way (or place) of escape for them
The human being does not get tired of praying for the good (things), but if the badness touches him then he becomes hopeless and discouraged

And if We make him taste of a mercy from Us after harm touches him, he shall say: this is because of me, and I do not think that the hour is established, and if I am returned to my Master, indeed there is better (things) for me with Him. We shall inform those who disbelieved of what they did, and We shall make them taste from a severe punishment
And when We favor upon the human being, he turns away and moves away to his side, and when the badness touches him then he has a lengthy prayer
Say: what do you think if it (Quran) is from God and you disbelieve in it, who is more mistaken than someone who is in extreme opposition (to it)

We are going to show them Our signs in the horizons (of universe) and in themselves until it is clarified for them that He is the truth. Or is it not enough that your Master is indeed a witness over everything
Know that indeed they are in doubt about meeting their Master. Know that indeed He surrounds everything
M. (Ha. Mim)
S. Q. (Ain. Sin. Qaf)
That is how God the powerful, the wise, reveals to you and to those before you
Whatever in the skies and whatever on the earth belongs to Him, and He is the superior, the great
The skies are about to tear apart from above them, and the angels glorify their Master with praise and ask forgiveness for whoever is on the earth. Know that indeed God is the forgiving, the merciful
And those who took protectors (and supporters) other than Him, God is guarding over them, and you are not their advocate

And that is how We revealed an Arabic Quran to you, so that you warn (the people of) the mother of the towns (Mecca) and its vicinity, and you warn of the day of assembly which there is no doubt in it, a group in the garden and a group in the burning fire
And if God wanted, He would have made you a single community (of faith), but He admits anyone He wants into His mercy. And the wrongdoers have no protector and no helper
Or did they take protectors other than God? Whereas God is the protector and He gives life to the dead and He is capable of everything
And anything you disagree about it, then its judgment (and decision) is with God. That is God, my Master, I trust in Him and I return to Him (in repentance)

Creator of the skies and the earth, He made spouses for you from yourselves, as well as mates for the livestock, by which He multiplies (and disperses) you in it. There is nothing like Him, and He hears all, sees all
The keys of the skies and the earth belong to Him, He increases and decreases the provision for anyone He wants. Indeed He knows everything

He legislated for you the religion (way of life) that He instructed Noah to it, and that which We revealed to you, and what We instructed Abraham and Moses and Jesus to it, to uphold the religion and do not become divided in it. What you invite them to it, is difficult for the polytheists. God chooses anyone He wants for Himself, and He guides to Himself anyone who turns (in repentance)

And they only became divided after the knowledge came to them because of jealousy between them. And if it was not for a word that previously came from your Master for a limited period, it would have been judged between them. And indeed those who were made to inherit the book after them are in a serious doubt about it

So invite for that (observing religion and not being divided in it), and stand firm as you were ordered, and do not follow their desires, and say: I believed in whatever book/mandate that God sent down, and I am ordered to be just (and fair) between you, God is our Master and your Master, our deeds for us and your deeds for you, there is no argument between us and you, God brings us together, and the final return is to Him
And those who argue about God after they answered to Him, their argument is invalid with their Master, and anger (of God) is upon them, and a severe punishment is for them
God is the One who sent down the book and the scale (of good and bad) with truth. And how would you know, the hour may be near

Those who do not believe in it want to rush it, and those who believed are afraid of it and they know that it is indeed the truth. Know that those who dispute about the hour are indeed lost far (from the right path)
God is nice to His servants, He provides for anyone He wants, and He is the strong, the powerful

Anyone who desires the harvest of the hereafter, We increase his harvest for him, and anyone who desires the harvest of this world, We give him from it, but in the hereafter there is no portion for him

Or do they have associates who legislate part of the religion for them, which God did not permit it? And if it was not for the decisive word (of God), it would have been judged between them. And indeed the wrongdoers have a painful punishment

You see the wrongdoers are afraid because of what they earned, and it (punishment) happens to them. And those who believed and did good works are in meadows of the gardens, they have whatever they want with their Master. That is the great bounty

That is what God gives good news (of it) to His servants, those who believed and did good works. Say: I do not ask you for any wage except for the love among the close ones (or the love of the closeness to God). And whoever commits a good deed, We increase its goodness for him. Indeed God is forgiving, appreciative

Or do they say: he made up a lie (and attributes it) to God? Then if God wants, He would seal your heart, but God eliminates the falsehood and proves the truth with His words. Indeed He knows what is inside the chests
And He is the One who accepts the repentance from His servants and excuses the bad deeds and knows what you do
And He answers those who believed and did good works, and He gives them more from His grace (and bounty), and the disbelievers have a severe punishment

And if He increases the provision of His servants, they would certainly commit injustice on the earth, but He sends down in amount that He wants. Indeed He is well informed and observant about His servants
And He is the One who sends down the rain after they lost hope and He spreads His mercy. And He is the praiseworthy protector
And among His signs is creation of the skies and the earth and whatever creature He scattered in them. And He is capable of bringing them together when He wants
And whatever tragedy happens to you is because of what your hands have done, and He excuses a lot
And you cannot weaken/escape (God) on the earth, and there is no protector or helper for you other than God
And among His signs are the sailing ships in the sea like the mountains/road signs
If He wants He makes the wind stand still, then they would become motionless on its back (sea's surface). Indeed there are signs in that for every patient and thankful (person)
Or He would destroy them for what they did, but He forgives a lot
And those who argue about Our signs should know that they have no way (or place) to escape
So everything you were given is an enjoyment of this world's life, but what is with God is better and more lasting for those who believed and trust in their Master
and those who avoid the great sins and indecencies, and they forgive when they are angry
and those who answered (the call of) their Master, and performed the mandatory prayer, and (conducted) their affairs by consultation among them, and spend (in God's way) from what We provided them
And those who defend themselves (or take revenge) when they suffer an injustice
(should know that) punishment of a bad deed is a bad deed like it, and anyone who excuses and settles then his reward is upon God. Indeed He does not like the wrongdoers
And certainly anyone who defends himself (or takes revenge), then there is no way against them
The way is only against those who do wrong to the people and unjustifiably commit injustice on the earth. They have a painful punishment
And anyone who is patient and forgives, indeed that is because of great determination (and willpower)
And whomever God misguides then he has no protector after Him. And you see the wrongdoers when they see the punishment, saying: is there any way to return

And you see them presented to it (the fire) humiliated from the disgrace, looking with a secret glance. And those who believed say: indeed the losers are those who lose themselves and their families on the resurrection day. Know that indeed the wrongdoers are in a lasting punishment
And there is no protector to help them other than God. And whomever God misguides, he has no way
Answer your Master before a day comes that it has no turning back by God. On that day there is no refuge for you and there is no denial for you

But if they stay away, We have not sent you as their guardian, you are only responsible for the preaching. And indeed when We make the human being taste from Our mercy he enjoys it, but if they suffer a tragedy because of what their hands sent ahead then indeed the human being is ungrateful
The rule of the skies and the earth belongs to God. He creates what He wants. He gives daughters to anyone He wants and gives the sons to anyone He wants
Or He combines them (giving them) sons and daughters and sons, and He makes anyone He wants infertile. Indeed He is knowledgeable and capable

And it is not for any human being that God speaks to him, except through revelation or from behind a barrier or by sending a messenger (angel) to reveal what He wants with His permission. God is indeed superior, wise

And like that We revealed to you a spirit by Our command. You did not used to know what the book or the belief/faith is, but We made it (Quran) a light and We guide anyone of Our servants that We want with it. And indeed you guide to a straight path (by this Quran)
path of God, the One that whatever in the skies and on the earth belongs to Him. Know that all affairs wind up with God
M. (Ha. Mim)
By the clear (and clarifying) book
Indeed We made it an Arabic Quran so that you may understand
And it is indeed in the main book with Us, (and it is) outstanding and wise
Should We take the reminder away from you, ignoring you because you are excessive people
And how many prophets did We send among the earlier ones
And no prophet came to them, unless they were ridiculing him
So We destroyed more courageous (and more powerful people) than them, and the example of the earlier ones passed by
And if you ask them: who created the skies and the earth? They shall say: the powerful and the knowledgeable created them
The One who made the earth a bed for you and He made roadways for you in it so that you may be guided (and find your way)
And the One who sent down rain from the sky with (proper) measure, then We brought dead land back to life with it. That is how you are brought out
And the One who created pairs of everything, and made the ships and the livestock for you to ride

So that you settle on its back, then when you are settled on it remember the favor of your Master and say: glory to the One (who is flawless) who brought this under our control (to be of service to us) while we were not capable of it
And we certainly return to our Master
And they made a part (an offspring) for Him from His servants. Indeed the human being is clearly ungrateful
Did He take daughters (for Himself) from what He creates, and He chose sons for you
And when one of them is given good news of what he assigns to the beneficent, his face turns dark (and shameful) while he holds back his anger
Or (do they assign to God) someone who is raised in luxury, and who is unclear in the debate
And they made the angels, those who are servants of the beneficent, females! Did they witness their creation? Their testimony is going to be written down and they will be questioned
And they said: if the beneficent wanted, we would not have served them. They have no knowledge of that, they only guess
Or did We give them a book before it, which they are adhering to it
No, but they said: we found our fathers on a course, and we are guided by their footsteps
And the same way, We did not send any town anyone as a warner before you, unless its rich (and wealthy) said: we found our fathers on a course, and we are following their footsteps
He (the warner) said: even if I have brought you a better guidance than what you found your fathers upon it? They said: we disbelieve in what you were sent with it
Then We took revenge from them, so see what the end of those who denied was
And (remember) when Abraham told his father and his people: I am free of what you serve
except the One who created me, indeed He is going to guide me
And he made it a lasting word among his descendants so that they may return (to God)
No, but I made these and their fathers enjoy until the truth and a clarifying messenger came to them
And when the truth came to them, they said: this is a magic and we are disbelievers in it
And they said: why this Quran was not sent down to a great man from the two towns (Mecca and Taif)

Do they divide up (and distribute) your Master’s mercy? We divided their livelihood (and wealth) between them in this world’s life. And We raised some of them above the others in ranks so that some of them take the others into service. And your Master’s mercy is better than what they accumulate

And if it was not that the people would become a single community (of disbelievers), We would have made houses, for anyone who disbelieves in the beneficent, with silver roofs and (silver) ladders to go up on it
and (silver) doors for their houses and (silver) couches that they lean on it
and (gold) ornament. And all that is only an enjoyment of this world’s life while the hereafter with your Master is for those who control themselves
And anyone who is blind about remembrance of the beneficent, We appoint a devil to him to be close to him
and indeed they shall obstruct them from the (right) way, and they think they are guided
Until when he comes to Us, saying: I wish there was distance of the two easts (the east and the west) between you (the appointed devil) and me, what a bad companion
And (you regret) never benefits you today, since you did wrong, indeed you are partners in the punishment
Can you make the deaf hear, or guide the blind and anyone who is in an obvious error
So if We take you away (from this world), then indeed We take revenge from them
Or (if) We show you that which We promised them, then We indeed have power over them (to do that)
So hold on to that which We revealed to you, indeed you are on a straight path
And indeed it (Quran) is a reminder for you and for your people, and you will be questioned
And ask (the followers of) Our messengers whom We sent before you: did We appoint any gods to be served other than the beneficent
And We have certainly sent Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his assembly, then he said: I am a messenger from the Master of Human kind
But when he brought them Our miracles, they laughed at it
And We did not show them any miracle unless it was bigger than its sister (the one before it). And We took them with the punishment so that they may return
And they said: magician, call on your Master for us according to His agreement with you, as we are indeed guided
But when We removed the punishment from them, they immediately broke (their promise)
And Pharaoh called out among his people, saying: my people, does not the rule of Egypt belong to me as do these rivers flowing underneath me? Do you not see
Am I not better than this one who is despicable and cannot express (himself) clearly
So why bracelets of gold were not given to him or the angels did not come accompanying him
Then he belittled his people and they obeyed him. Indeed they were disobedient people
So when they enraged Us, We took revenge from them and drowned them all
So We made them a thing of the past and an example for the later ones
And when the son of Mary (Jesus) was given as an example, your people turned away from it (laughing and shouting)
And they said: are our gods better or is he? They only gave you (this example) to argue. No, but they are argumentative people
He (Jesus) was only a servant whom We favored upon him and We made him an example for children of Israel
And if We wanted, We would have made some of you angels on the earth, to succeed you
And it is certainly an indication of the hour, so do not doubt it, and follow Me. This is a straight path
And do not let Satan hold you up, as he is indeed your clear enemy
And when Jesus brought the clear proofs, he said: I have certainly brought you the wisdom to clarify for you some of that which you disagree about it, so be cautious of God and obey me
Indeed God is He who is my Master and your Master, so serve Him. This is a straight path
But the parties disagreed among themselves, so woe to those who did wrong from punishment of a painful day
Do they wait (for anything) except the hour to come to them suddenly, while they do not realize
On that day, the friends are enemy of each other except those who controlled themselves
My servants, there is no fear for you today, and you will not be sad
Those who believed in Our signs and were submitted
you and your spouses enter the garden, being delighted
Golden plates and drinking glasses are circulated for them, and whatever the soul desires and pleases the eyes is in there, and you remain in it forever
And this is the garden that you are made to inherit because of what you were doing
There are plenty of fruits for you to eat in it
Indeed the guilty ones remain in the punishment of hell forever
It is not reduced for them and they are hopeless in it
We did not wrong them, but they were the wrongdoers
And they call out: master (of hell), have your Master finish us off. He says: indeed you are staying
We have certainly brought you the truth, but most of you dislike the truth
Or did they firmly settle on an issue, then indeed We are firmly settled too
Or do they think that We do not hear their secret and their whisper? Yes (We hear them), and Our messengers are with them writing
Say: if there was a child for the beneficent, then I would be the first of the servants
Master of the skies and the earth, Master of the throne is flawless (and beyond) what they describe
So leave them talk uselessly and play until they meet their day which they are promised
And He is the One who is god in the skies and god in the earth, and He is the wise, the knowledgeable
And blessed is the One that the rule of the skies and the earth and whatever between them belongs to Him, and the knowledge of the hour is with Him, and you are returned to Him
And those you call on besides Him have no power of the mediation, except whoever testifies with the truth, and they know (the truth)
And if you ask them who created them? They shall say: God. So how do they deviate
And his saying was: my Master, indeed these people do not believe
(God said:) so pardon/ignore them and say peace (and well-being), they will know
M. (Ha. Mim)
By the clear (and clarifying) book
Indeed We revealed it in a blessed night, indeed We are warners
Every wise command is made distinct (and well defined) in it
a command from Us. Indeed We are senders
A mercy from your Master. Indeed He hears all, knows all
Master of the skies and the earth and whatever is between them, if you are certain
There is no god except Him, He gives life and causes death, your Master and Master of your forefathers
No, but they play around in doubt
So expect a day that the sky brings a visible smoke
covering people. This is a painful punishment
Our Master, remove the punishment from us, indeed we are believers
How is the reminder (of any use) for them, while a clarifying messenger has come to them
and they turned away from him and they said he is a mad man taught (by others)
We remove the punishment a little, (then) indeed you return (to disbelief)
On a day that We assault with the great assault, indeed We take revenge
And We have certainly tested people of Pharaoh before them, and a noble messenger came to them
(saying) that: deliver the servants of God to me, I am an honest messenger for you
and do not (try to) rise over God, indeed I brought you a clear reason
And indeed I look for protection with my Master and your Master, that you don't stone me
And if you do not believe me then stay away from me
Then he (Moses) called on his Master: indeed these are guilty people
(God told Moses:) So travel with My servants by night, indeed you will be followed
and leave the sea calmly, indeed they will be a drowned army
How many gardens and springs did they leave behind
and plantations and superb residence
and riches that they were happy in it
It was like that, and We made other people inherit it
And the skies and the earth did not cry over them, and they were not given any delay
And We have certainly saved the children of Israel from the humiliating punishment
of Pharaoh. He was indeed foremost among the excessive ones
And We have certainly chosen them knowingly above all other people
And We gave them the signs, that in which there was a clear test
Indeed these (people) say
there is only our first death, and we will not be raised (again)
if you are truthful then bring (back) our fathers
Are they better or people of Tubba and those before them? We destroyed them, indeed they were guilty
And We did not create the skies and the earth and whatever is between them playing around
We did not create them except with the truth (and purpose), but most of them do not know
Indeed the day of separation/decision is appointment for all of them
A day when a friend is not of any use to any friend at all, and they are not be helped
except whoever God has mercy (on him). He is indeed the powerful, the merciful
Indeed the Zaqqum tree
is food of the sinful
It boils in the stomachs like melted metal (or burning oil)
like boiling of the boiling water
Take him and drag him into the middle of the hellfire
Then pour from punishment of the boiling water over his head
Taste, indeed you (thought you) are the powerful and the noble
Indeed this is what you used to doubt about it
Those who control themselves will be in a safe position
in gardens and springs
They wear (clothes) from fine and heavy silk, facing each other
It is like that. And We marry them to appealing girls with beautiful eyes
They call for all kind of fruit in there safely
They do not taste death in it except the first death, and He protected them from punishment of the hellfire
A bounty (and a grace) from your Master. That is the great victory
Indeed We made it (Quran) easy in your language so that they may take notice
So watch, indeed they are watching (too)
M. (Ha. Mim)
Sending down of the book is from God, the powerful, the wise
Indeed there are signs in the skies and the earth for the believers
And there are signs in your creation and creatures that He scatters (throughout the earth) for people who are certain

And the alternation of the night and the day, and what God sends down as provision from the sky (rain), then He gives life to the earth after its death with it, and changing of the winds, are signs for people who understand
These are God's signs that We read it to you in truth. So in what saying do they believe after God and His signs
Woe to every lying sinner
who hears God' signs that is read to him, then he arrogantly insists (on his disbelief), as if he did not hear them. So give him news of a painful punishment
And when he learns something from Our signs, he takes it as a joke. They have a humiliating punishment
Ahead of them is hell, and what they did is of no use to them at all, and neither is what they took as protectors other than God. And a painful punishment is for them
This (Quran) is guidance, and those who disbelieved in their Master’s signs have a punishment of painful filth
God is the One who brought the sea under your control (and at your service) so that the ships sail for you in it by His command, and so that you look for His bounty and you may be thankful
And He brought whatever in the skies and whatever on the earth under your control (and at your service), all of which are from Him. Indeed there are sings in that for people who think
Tell those who believed to forgive those who do not hope for God's days, so that He rewards people for what they were doing
Whoever does good work then it is for himself, and whoever does bad then it is against himself, then you are returned to your Master
And We have certainly given children of Israel the book and the authority and the prophethood, and We provided them with good things, and We preferred them over all other people

And We gave them clear proofs in the matter (of religion), then they disagreed because of jealousy between them only after the knowledge came to them. Indeed your Master judges between them regarding what they were disagreeing about it, on the resurrection day
Then We put you on a legislation of the affair (of religion), so follow it and do not follow the desires of those who do not know
Indeed they will never be of any use to you against God at all. And the wrongdoers are indeed protectors (and supporters) of each other, and God is protector of those who control themselves
This (Quran) is enlightenment for the people, and a guide and a mercy for people who are certain
Or do those who committed the bad deeds think that We make them equal, in their life and in their death, to those who believed and did good works? They judge badly
And God created the skies and the earth with the truth (and purpose), so that every person is rewarded for what it did, and they will not be wronged

Did you see one who took his desires as his god, and God misguided him (according to His laws) in spite of his knowledge and sealed his hearing and his heart and put a cover on his eye? Who guides him after God? Do you not take notice
And they say: There is nothing except our life of this world, we die and we live (and world goes on), and only time destroys us. And they have no knowledge of this, they only guess
And when Our clear verses are read to them, their only argument is to say: bring our fathers back if you are truthful
Say: God gives you life, then makes you die, then gathers you on the resurrection day that there is no doubt about it, but most people do not know
And the rule of the skies and the earth belongs to God. And on a day that the hour establishes, on that day the falsifiers (and the followers of falsehood) lose
And you see every community kneeling down, every community is called onto its book (and is told): today you are rewarded for what you were doing
This is Our book speaking against you with the truth. We were writing out whatever you were doing
As for those who believed and did good works, their Master admits them into His mercy. That is the clear victory
And as for those who disbelieved (they are told): were not My verses read to you? But you were arrogant and you were guilty people
And when it was said: God’s promise is indeed true, and there is no doubt about the hour. You said: we do not know what the hour is, we think it is only a guess, and we are not certain
And badness of what they did appears to them, and what they used to ridicule surrounds them
And it is said: today We forget you as you forgot meeting of this day of yours, and your housing is the fire, and there is no helper for you
that is because you took God’s signs as a joke and this world’s life deceived you. So today they are not taken out of it, and they are not asked to apologize (to appease God)
All praise belongs to God, Master of the skies and Master of the earth, Master of humankind
And the greatness (and the majesty) in the skies and the earth belongs to Him, and He is the powerful, the wise
